Articles.Title: Your Mac Has a Hidden White Noise Generator
Articles.Content: If you want to drown out environmental noise, or you just like having white noise in the background while you work, you should try your Mac’s white noise generator. The feature is actually built into every Mac that runs macOS Ventura, you just need to know wh…

Articles.Title: Spotify’s redesigned Apple Watch app feels less like an afterthought
Articles.Content: Spotify is giving its Apple Watch users some love, adding UI and playback upgrades that more closely align with the familiar experience from larger screens. In an update that starts rolling out today, watchOS users will see a beefed-up Your Library view with …

Articles.Title: Windows 11's iCloud Photos integration is now available
Articles.Content:
If you use an iPhone and a Windows PC, syncing photos is about to get a lot easier. The feature Microsoft announced last month that adds iCloud Photos to the Windows Photos app
 begins rolling out today. Microsoft says
 it will be available to all Windows 1…

Articles.Title: Modders thought it would be fun to make a folding iPhone
Articles.Content: You don't have wait for Apple to see what a foldable iPhone would look like in practice. China-based The Aesthetics of Science and Technology (AST) claims to have built a folding iPhone through heavy modifications. The engineers say they created the one-off w…

Articles.Title: The Polar Ignite 3 comes with a daily ‘alertness’ forecast
Articles.Content: The $329.95 Polar lgnite 3 fitness watch introduces SleepWise, a new feature that analyzes your sleep and circadian rhythms to deliver a daily “alertness” forecast. It also adds multiband GPS and in-training voice guidance.

Articles.Title: Hackers Claim World’s First Folding iPhone Required a Monumental Amount of Modifications

Articles.Title: Nailed It: Amazon Becomes the First Company Ever to Lose $1 Trillion in Stock Value
Articles.Content: Amazon, one of the first companies to join the prestigious $1 trillion dollar valuation club, just passed another, admittedly less desirable milestone. This week, Jeff Bezos’ Everything Store became the first publicly traded company to lose $1 tillion in mark…

Articles.Title: Jennifer Aniston has zero regrets about trying IVF
Articles.Content: The Morning Show and Friends star says she tried to get pregnant but "the ship has sailed".

Articles.Title: USB adapter claims to quadruple M2 and M1 Mac monitor support
Articles.Content: Apple says most M2- and M1-based computers only support 1 external monitor.

Articles.Title: Amazon and Apple 'Colluded' to Make iPhone and iPad More Expensive, Says Antitrust Lawsuit
Articles.Content:
Apple and Amazon worked together to raise the price of iPhones and iPads by eliminating third-party Amazon sellers who offered Apple products at a lower cost, according to a new antitrust lawsuit filed today in Washington.





The complaint, filed by Hagens …

Articles.Title: Meta to cut more than 11000 jobs in one of the biggest layoffs this year
Articles.Content: Meta Platforms Inc (META.O) said on Wednesday it will let go of 13% of its workforce, or more than 11,000 employees, in one of the biggest layoffs this year as the Facebook parent battles …

Articles.Title: Asian shares fall ahead of U.S. CPI, crypto worries mount
Articles.Content: Asian share markets were tense on Thursday and the dollar held on to its overnight gains before the big test of a U.S. consumer inflation report, while market sentiment took a dive as the likely collapse of a major crypto exchange spooked investors.

Articles.Title: Tesla shares down over 5%, hit the lowest level in 20 months

Articles.Title: ByteDance's U.S. copyright lawsuit over 'League of Legends' duplicative, says judge
Articles.Content: ByteDance's Shanghai Moonton Technology Co Ltd does not have to face Riot Games Inc's copyright lawsuit over allegations that Moonton copied parts of the mobile version of Riot's hit "League of Legends," according to a ruling in Los Angeles federal court.

Articles.Title: Amazon Fire TV Cube (2022) review: Faster and smarter, but with a couple of caveats
Articles.Content: If you're looking for one of the fastest streaming devices on the market, Amazon has you covered with the Fire TV Cube (2022). Just be prepared to deal with a few caveats while trying to find something to watch.
